p: Mercury concentrations in tilapia fillets analyzed in the market survey were similar to the U.S. FDA report on Hg concentrations of fish and shellfish [ 45]. The U.S. FDA action level for Hg is 1.0 mg kg -1(ppm wet weight), but many countries have level of 0.5 mg kg -1 as acceptable Hg concentration in fish tissue [ 46, 47]. Mercury concentration in all the tilapia fillets in this study were under 0.5 mg kg -1.
